description: Surrogate primary key for this availability record; uniquely identifies a weekly schedule for a contact.
Identifier of the contact/person (e.g., driver, technician) whose availability is recorded for the specified week.
Year context for the schedule, likely fiscal year used by the organization; confirm with SME.
Week number within f_year for which availability is defined (likely ISO week; confirm with SME).
Calendar date corresponding to Sunday of the referenced week.
Shift or availability code for Sunday (e.g., day/evening, on-call); values follow scheduling configuration; confirm with SME.
Calendar date corresponding to Monday of the referenced week.
Shift or availability code for Monday; values defined by scheduling configuration; confirm with SME.
Calendar date corresponding to Tuesday of the referenced week.
Shift or availability code for Tuesday; values defined by scheduling configuration; confirm with SME.
Calendar date corresponding to Wednesday of the referenced week.
Shift or availability code for Wednesday; values defined by scheduling configuration; confirm with SME.
Calendar date corresponding to Thursday of the referenced week.
Shift or availability code for Thursday; values defined by scheduling configuration; confirm with SME.
Calendar date corresponding to Friday of the referenced week.
Shift or availability code for Friday; values defined by scheduling configuration; confirm with SME.
Calendar date corresponding to Saturday of the referenced week.
Shift or availability code for Saturday; values defined by scheduling configuration; confirm with SME.
System timestamp indicating when this record was last updated.
Timestamp captured by the user-facing application for the most recent change; may duplicate last_modified; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user, role, or system that created the record (e.g., shop, warehouse); confirm meaning with SME.
Timestamp when the record was created by the user or system.
Identifier of the user or system that last modified this record.
Timestamp when the record was last modified by the user or system.
